org.apache.hadoop.hdfs

    Package Description
    org.apache.hadoop.fs

    A distributed implementation of FileSystem.

  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hdfs used by org.apache.hadoop.fs 
    Class and Description
    DFSClient
    DFSClient can connect to a Hadoop Filesystem and perform basic file tasks.
  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hdfs used by org.apache.hadoop.hdfs 
    Class and Description
    BlockReader
    A BlockReader is responsible for reading a single block from a single datanode.
    BlockReaderFactory
    Utility class to create BlockReader implementations.
    BlockReaderFactory.BlockReaderPeer 
    BlockReaderFactory.FailureInjector 
    BlockReaderLocal
    BlockReaderLocal enables local short circuited reads.
    BlockReaderLocal.Builder 
    BlockReaderLocalLegacy
    BlockReaderLocalLegacy enables local short circuited reads.
    BlockReaderLocalLegacy.LocalDatanodeInfo 
    BlockStorageLocationUtil.VolumeBlockLocationCallable
    Callable that sets up an RPC proxy to a datanode and queries it for volume location information for a list of ExtendedBlocks.
    ClientContext
    ClientContext contains context information for a client.
    DeprecatedUTF8
    A simple wrapper around UTF8.
    DFSClient
    DFSClient can connect to a Hadoop Filesystem and perform basic file tasks.
    DFSClient.Conf
    DFSClient configuration
    DFSClientFaultInjector
    Used for injecting faults in DFSClient and DFSOutputStream tests.
    DFSHedgedReadMetrics
    The client-side metrics for hedged read feature.
    DFSInotifyEventInputStream
    Stream for reading inotify events.
    DFSInputStream
    DFSInputStream provides bytes from a named file.
    DFSInputStream.DNAddrPair
    Utility class to encapsulate data node info and its address.
    DFSInputStream.ReaderStrategy
    Wraps different possible read implementations so that readBuffer can be strategy-agnostic.
    DFSInputStream.ReadStatistics 
    DFSOutputStream
    DFSOutputStream creates files from a stream of bytes.
    DFSOutputStream.DataStreamer 
    DFSOutputStream.DataStreamer.ResponseProcessor 
    DFSPacket
    DFSPacket is used by DataStreamer and DFSOutputStream.
    DFSUtil.AddressMatcher 
    DFSUtil.ConfiguredNNAddress
    Represent one of the NameNodes configured in the cluster.
    DistributedFileSystem.DiskStatus
    Deprecated. 
    Use FsStatus instead
    ExtendedBlockId
    An immutable key which identifies a block.
    KeyProviderCache 
    LeaseRenewer
    Used by DFSClient for renewing file-being-written leases on the namenode.
    LeaseRenewer.Factory
    A factory for sharing LeaseRenewer objects among DFSClient instances so that there is only one renewer per authority per user.
    LeaseRenewer.Factory.Key 
    NameNodeProxies.ProxyAndInfo
    Wrapper for a client proxy as well as its associated service ID.
    PeerCache
    A cache of input stream sockets to Data Node.
    PeerCache.Key 
    PeerCache.Value 
    RemoteBlockReader
    Deprecated. 
    this is an old implementation that is being left around in case any issues spring up with the new RemoteBlockReader2 implementation. It will be removed in the next release.
    RemotePeerFactory
